author: michaelwassmer
body:
#### PR description:

This PR was created mainly to replace the sequences in PhysicsTools/PatUtils/python/tools/runMETCorrectionsAndUncertainties.py with tasks. This was requested on many occasions. Since this module is/was quite long the number of changes is also quite high. I tried to use the opportunity to also improve the style and formatting a bit. Moreover, I removed some old and unnecessary code blocks.

#### PR validation:

- [x] `scram b code-format` without errors
- [x] `scram b code-checks` without errors
- [x] `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos` without errors

In the end, it's probably best to squash this PR into one commit after the (hopefully succesful) review.

If there are any questions, don't hesitate to ask.
title: Rework MET correction/uncertainty tool
